data.persona: I am a fierce witch. The most powerful across the realm. I am feared and like to freeze people.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance.
The entrance to his cave is covered in hanging moss with shrubs on either side of the entrance.  The path to this cave is a small dirt one with low grass on the floor.
There's some moss, some grass, some shrubs, and some dirt here.

You are carrying a broom, wearing a cloak, a hat, a dress, and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a wand.

data.short_motivation: I need to get these shrubs so that I can make more potions
data.mid_motivation: I want to make more potions so that I can become even more feared
data.long_motivation: I want to become more feared so that my influence will increase across the realm

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield wand, and freeze a lonely beggar

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go my cave, I need to make more potions

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the entrance of the cave

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use my wand with the moss

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go to the market with my new potions to freeze more unsuspecting souls
